allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8081 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
Write-Output "done"
PSEOF)

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_.OwningProcess -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
Write-Output "done"
PSEOF)

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8081 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_-Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Write-Host ''Port 8081 freed''")
Bash(cmd /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -ano ^| findstr :8081 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do @taskkill /F /PID %a 2>nul & echo freed")
